patterns: What kinds of items are there?

responses: We accept VISA, Mastercard and Paypal

patterns: When do I get my delivery?
responses: Delivery takes 2-4 days
Shipping takes 2-4 days

patterns: What's the status of my order?
responses: Please provide your order number, and I will check the status for you.
Can you give me your order ID to track the status?

patterns: How do I return a product?
responses: You can return any item within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our returns page for more details.
Our return policy allows for returns within 30 days. Visit our returns page for more information.

patterns: How do I exchange a product?
responses: You can exchange an item within 30 days of purchase. Please visit our exchanges page for more details.
Our exchange policy allows for exchanges within 30 days. Visit our exchanges page for more information.

patterns: How do I cancel my order?
responses: Please provide your order number, and I will check if it can be canceled.
Can you give me your order ID to check if the cancellation is possible?

patterns: How can I leave a review?
responses: We appreciate your feedback! Please visit our feedback page to leave your comments.
You can leave a review on our feedback page. We value your suggestions!
